job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Environmental Services,Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting
job.description: Mackin Talent is seeking a Data Scientist to support our client in Seattle WA The main function of this role is to produce innovative solutions driven by exploratory data analysis from complex and highdimensional datasetsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliApply technical expertise with quantitative analysis machine learning data mining experimentation simulation and the presentation of data to develop strategies for our productsliliIdentify and measure success of product efforts through goal setting forecasting and monitoring of key product metrics to understand trendsliliDefine understand and test opportunities and levers to improve the product and drive roadmaps through your insights and recommendationsliliGenerate and test hypotheses and analyze and interpret the results of product experimentsliliPartner with Product Engineering and crossfunctional teams to inform influence support and execute product strategy and investment decisionsliliProvide Business Intelligence BI and data visualization supportbrliulstronguMinimum RequirementsbrustrongulliProficient with data querying languages eg SQLliliExperience with scripting languages eg Python andor statistical software eg Râ€¨liliEffective communication able to convey complex information and influence your partners using clear insights and recommendationsliliExperience working with large datasetsliliMasters or PhD Degree in a quantitative fieldliliYears of experience  2 years for Masters 01 year for PHDbrliulMackin Talent offers an attractive benefits package which includes choice of major medical carriers like Aetna Kaiser and BCBS 15 days of PTO plus Holiday and Sick pay paid volunteer hours paternitymaternity leave and many more We pride ourselves on our company values the top one being that Relationships Matter Come experience the Mackin Difference and our welcoming company culture with a focus on teamwork and family Learn more about Mackin and apply online at MackinTalentcom
